title: MUSIC MUS_THRY 335-0-20 Selected Topics in Music Theory

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This class engages Brahms&#39 Op. 116-Op. 119 through analysis. The primary focus will be on the interaction of grouping structure?phrases, sections?with meter and harmony. The class workload will involve daily analysis assignments, class discussion, and a final written analytic project.

subject: MUS_THRY
